properties.name: nixer.stigma.cookie-name
properties.description: Name of HTTP cookie to be used for storing Stigma Token.

properties.name: nixer.stigma.decryption-key-file
properties.description: Location of file resource with decryption keys to be used for reading Stigma Tokens. Can be either a "classpath:" pseudo URL, a "file:" URL, or a plain file path.

properties.name: nixer.stigma.encryption-key-file
properties.description: Location of file resource with encryption key to be used for creating Stigma Tokens. Can be either a "classpath:" pseudo URL, a "file:" URL, or a plain file path.

properties.name: nixer.stigma.stigma-lifetime
properties.description: Amount of time after Stigma is considered expired.
